official_languages: Ossetian https://web.archive.org/web/20130509075727/http://www.neweasterneurope.eu/node/117 Presidential Elections in South Ossetia – Plan B The first round of voting was accompanied by a referendum in which the Ossetians were to decide whether Russian should become the second official language of South Ossetia. Nearly 85 per cent of the voters supported the referendum.
